WorkItem.Description: Right now Vampiric Touch is handled separately by each module as it needs to know how effective it is (i.e. how much MP5 it is worth). Similar for example Judgement of Wisdom might need a setting for the uptime. Would there be value in centralizing these settings so all the modules handle them in the same way?

Comments.Message: Aye, I've been thinking of adding a slider for each of these buffs right on the buffs tab... Nothing done yet, so if you want to do it, go ahead. Otherwise, I'll get to it when I can.

Or actually, multiple sliders for some of them, I guess... I suppose we'd want to define an array of options for each buff... But then, I'm not sure how this would interact with the buffs comparison chart... Hmm...
